== Bio ==
Joel is currently employed at the National Supercomputer Centre (NSC),
Linköping University, and works as coordinator for the NeIC Bio- and
Medical Sciences strategic area. Joel was educated at Linköping
University and has a PhD in Bioinformatics, focusing on automated
protein family definition and distributed computing. He has worked with
coordination of distributed projects, community building, and leading
development projects for secure science gateways and persistent and
accessible storage, and he is currently engaged as an Application Expert
in Bioinformatics for the Swedish e-Science Research Centre.
